name: Trolley's Delayma
description:
Entry for Ludum Dare 50 Compo.

Try to keep the trolley delayed as much as possible, for as long as 11 levels.

Controls:

  • Moving: WASD / d-pad
  • Action: Spacebar / A (xbox) / B (switch) / X (PS)
  • Restart: Enter / Menu / Start

Note: You need a loop marked entirely with the dark green background, otherwise it doesn't count.

Art inspired by Baba is You.
